abstracts.cdata!:
The Loan and Credit would support the
            implementation of the Government's structural
            adjustment program as outlined in the statement of
            development policy. The program consists of a number of
            significant improvements in the areas of development
            planning, agricultural/water sector policies, energy sector
            policies and industrial sector policies. The Loan and Credit
            would finance high-priority imports by both public and
            private sectors. Counterpart funds would be used for
            development expenditures by the Federal Government. The
            Government has requested technical assistance to support the
            implementation of the adjustment program: a separate credit
            for this purpose is being proposed.
